messages.title: A strong voice for Hastings and Rye
messages.content: We've achieved so much in the last five years, but we need to stick to the long term plan to secure a stronger future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: More high skilled jobs and greater business investment in our towns and residents.
Greater education standards and a hospital with centre of excellence status.
A better deal for our fishing communities and increases in our tourism industry.

issues.economy: Unemployment has fallen by 50% in the last five years, with almost 1,500 more people in work. Business investment has increased with companies like Saga investing in our towns.
issues.education: Since 2010, 3,410 residents have started an apprenticeship, giving them the skills they need.
issues.governance: I have been banging the drum for our events and cultural delights, and effective tourism boom.

leaflet.personalStatement: For a strong and effective MP who will be accountable to you, vote Amber Rudd on 7th May.

politicalExperience.achievements: Helped the local economy with the unemployment halving. Secured Â£300 million of road and rail investments. The Link Road and A21 are improving and we have the HS1 on track to Hastings and Rye.

images.caption: Images of Amber Rudd with constituents and campaigning.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes Amber Rudd's role in local improvements, her support for business investment, and her commitment to education and community deals. It suggests a focus on continued economic growth and community support.
